title: Platform screen door fault causing delays

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: The Platform Screen Doors fault has cleared. Normal train services from #JooKoon to #JurongEast have resumed. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
[EWL] UPDATE: The Platform Screen Doors fault have been rectified.  Train svcs are progressively being restored. Add train travel time from #JooKoon to #JurongEast reduced to 10 mins.
[EWL]: Due to a platform screen door fault, pls add 15mins train travel time from #JooKoon to #JurongEast towards #PasirRis.
